new_ideas.name: Focus on new ideas to attack the problem
new_ideas.prompt: IMPORTANT: Focus specifically on generating new, creative ideas to attack this problem. Think outside the box and explore unconventional approaches that haven't been tried yet. Don't just rehash existing approaches - be innovative and propose fresh angles of attack.

continue_notes.name: Continue with the line of attack stated in notes
continue_notes.prompt: IMPORTANT: Focus on continuing and building upon the specific line of attack or approach already outlined in the notes.md file. Stay consistent with the established direction and extend the existing work rather than starting completely new approaches.

literature_ideas.name: Look at relevant literature and find ideas there
literature_ideas.prompt: IMPORTANT: Focus on examining the relevant literature and research papers to find ideas, techniques, and approaches that could be applied to this problem. Draw insights from existing academic work and adapt proven methods to the current challenge.

improve_writeup.name: Notice flaws in current writeup and improve it
improve_writeup.prompt: IMPORTANT: Focus on carefully analyzing the current writeup for flaws, gaps, unclear explanations, logical errors, or areas that need improvement. Provide constructive criticism and specific suggestions for making the work more rigorous and complete.
